Container.Name: jmusicbot
Container.Overview:
To start, run once, then modify config.txt with the owner Discord ID and Discord Bot token. Restart the container to use new settings.
Docker container for https://github.com/jagrosh/MusicBot Container built from https://hub.docker.com/r/yojoshb/jmusicbot/
Likely working alternate repos: SeVile/MusicBot

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Directory where config.txt and serversettings.json are held.

Config.Name: Bot Repository
Config.Description: Format: {owner}/{repo}. Changes what repository is used for the bot. Useful when the bot breaks with no public fix other than a forked repo.
